job_description:
Senior Accountant

Location: Koratty (Infopark) Experience: 3–6 Years Job Type: Full-time

Job Summary

We are seeking a proactive, detail-oriented Senior Accountant to manage our financial operations with a heavy focus on cash flow forecasting and receivables management. Beyond standard compliance and reporting, the ideal candidate will be responsible for predicting income/expenses based on active Invoices and Purchase Orders (POs) and ensuring the timely collection of pending payments to maintain healthy liquidity.

Key Responsibilities

  • Forecasting & Cash Flow: Develop and maintain accurate financial forecasts by analyzing Invoices, POs, and historical data to predict future income and expenses.
  • Receivables & Collections: Take ownership of the accounts receivable process; track pending payments, follow up with clients, and ensure high collection efficiency.
  • SEZ & Statutory Compliance: Ensure full compliance with SEZ regulations (Softex, Serf) and handle all related filings accurately.
  • Taxation & Filings: Manage timely filing for GST, TDS, ESI, and PF, ensuring strict adherence to Indian tax and labor laws.
  • Financial Reporting: Perform month-end closing, bank reconciliations, and prepare accurate P&L statements and Balance Sheets.
  • Payroll: Oversee end-to-end payroll processing, including salary calculations and statutory deductions.
  • Audit Coordination: Collaborate with internal and external auditors for smooth compliance checks.

Qualifications & Skills

  • Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting or Finance.
  • Experience: 3–6 years of relevant experience, preferably within an SEZ company or a fast-paced startup environment.
  • Software: Proficiency in Tally or QuickBooks. Strong familiarity with Zoho Books is highly preferred.
  • Analytical Rigor: Proven ability to forecast budgets and manage working capital.
  • Communication: Excellent interpersonal skills for professional yet firm payment collections and internal reporting.

Why Join Us?

At Koncepts Lab, you will play a pivotal role in the financial health of a growing startup, with the autonomy to implement best practices in financial planning and recovery.

How to Apply

Interested candidates can send their resume to hr@konceptslab.com with the subject “Application for Senior Accountant”. If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@konceptslab.com.
summary: Senior Accountant role focusing on cash flow forecasting, receivables management, and statutory compliance in a startup environment. Requires 3-6 years of experience with expertise in accounting software and SEZ regulations.

Cascade Revenue Management, an AIMA Group company, is a trusted provider of IT-enabled and revenue cycle management solutions established in 2015. As part of the globally recognized AIMA Group, Cascade delivers specialized services across custom software development, quality assurance, and end-to-end RCM operations. The organization also supports clients through digital marketing, eCommerce enablement, and back-office BPO services. Serving startups through Fortune 500 enterprises across multiple industries and geographies, Cascade operates globally with headquarters in Sarasota, Florida, and offices in Toronto, London, and Kochi, India.

Role Overview

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Engineer with strong expertise in Django and React to join our growing engineering team. This is a full-time remote role focused on designing, building, and maintaining scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications. The position requires deep technical proficiency, architectural thinking, and the ability to contribute to technical leadership while collaborating closely with cross-functional stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using Django (Python) for backend development and React (JavaScript/TypeScript) for frontend interfaces.
  • Architect secure, efficient, and high-availability systems capable of handling large data volumes and complex workflows.
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineering teams to define technical requirements and implement new features.
  • Optimize application performance, scalability, and overall user experience.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code aligned with modern development standards and best practices.
  • Implement automated testing strategies and contribute to CI/CD pipelines to ensure reliable deployments.
  • Conduct code reviews, mentor junior engineers, and promote a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing.
  • Stay current with emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends to support innovation and technical excellence.

Required Qualifications

  • Minimum 5+ years of professional experience in full-stack software development.
  • Strong proficiency in Django (Python), including Django REST Framework (DRF) and ORM concepts.
  • Extensive experience with React (JavaScript/TypeScript), including hooks, component-based architecture, and state management tools such as Redux or Context API.
  • Solid understanding of relational databases such as PostgreSQL or MySQL, including performance tuning and optimization.
  • Experience designing and integrating RESTful APIs, GraphQL services, and WebSocket-based applications.
  • Hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
  • Familiarity with containerization and orchestration tools including Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Knowledge of frontend build tools and bundlers such as Webpack, Vite, or Babel.
  • Experience implementing CI/CD pipelines and working within DevOps environments.
  • Strong analytical, debugging, and problem-solving capabilities with attention to detail.
  • Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively within distributed teams.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline, or equivalent practical experience.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience with modern frontend frameworks and tools such as Next.js or Tailwind CSS.
  • Exposure to microservices architecture and distributed system design.
  • Knowledge of authentication and security best practices, including OAuth and JWT.
  • Prior experience mentoring engineers or contributing to technical leadership initiatives.

Contact Information
